attributes.action: Install new rail connections on the isle of wight
attributes.additional_details: The Isle of Wight hasn't had a strong railway connection across the island since 1966 and a new line(s) would help decrease traffic and pollution, it would also help with bus times as right now it takes over a hour and a half to get to Freshwater from shanklin but with a new line it could remove up to half of the travel time
attributes.background: a new railway line to Newport,Ventor,Cowes and/or Freshwater.

rejection.details: We are not allowed to accept petitions that deal only with a local area, even when there may be some involvement from central government in respect of decision-making or funding.
